entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
